title: Mice from the Planet Zimlac
description: A beautifully illustrated, fanciful tale for children. Grandma is visited by playful mice who cause chaos in her kitchen with their talent for levitation.. They fly around her kitchen in cups, saucers, and bowls. They pester her cat. They make her grandchildren laugh. They break a lot of dishes. Then they say goodbye.
author: Ramey Channell
